General.Name: Strong Petrochemical Holdings Limited
General.Description: Strong Petrochemical Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, trades in commodities. Its commodities include crude oil, petroleum products, petrochemicals, and coal. The company is also involved in the provision of storage and other ancillary services for petroleum products and petrochemicals; and leasing and property investment activities, as well as installation and maintenance service of solar energy systems. It operates in the People's Republic of China, Hong Kong, Singapore, and Macao. Strong Petrochemical Holdings Limited was incorporated in 1999 and is headquartered in Admiralty, Hong Kong.
General.Address: Far East Finance Centre, Admiralty, Hong Kong
